hero.title: One world - One ID - One future
leadBlocks: Imagine a world connected by a single global ID - one identification for every person on earth, united to tackle our greatest challenges.
A universal EinStrong ID (ESi) empowers each of us to fight climate change and end poverty - together.
Download ESi app below and turn the Power of One into the power for all.

introBlocks: The EinStrong ID (ESi) is a global identification and empowerment system designed for adults aged 18 and over. It combines secure identity verification with basic financial functionality, enabling both individuals and organizations to participate in global aid distribution and local economic exchange.

creatingExpandingAccess.heading: Creating and Expanding ESi Access
bullets: Any adult can create their own ESi account using the ESi app.
An ESi app user can also create accounts for others — including family, friends, or entire communities without smartphones — making it ideal for organizers and humanitarian teams.
For individuals without smartphones, the app can generate a printed ESi ID card, enabling access to funds and participation in the system without requiring digital literacy.

The printed ESi card functions like a debit card. It allows the holder to spend or transfer funds when transacting with someone using the ESi app on a smartphone — an ideal setup for everyday transactions, such as purchasing goods from vendors.

secureInclusiveUse.heading: Secure and Inclusive Use
bullets: The mobile app allows users to both receive and send funds.
The printed ESi card allows users to spend funds at local vendors or transfer to others — ideal for people with limited access to technology.
Transfers can be made between ESi account holders who are in physical proximity, whether between two ESi apps or between an app and a printed ESi card.
A common use case: Vendors with the ESi app on their phone can receive payments from customers using either another ESi app or a printed ESi card.

items.title: Funding Distribution
items.text: The EinStrong Foundation sends funds directly to every individual ESi account.

items.title: Peer-to-Peer Transfers
items.text: ESi holders can then transfer funds between one another — whether between family members, or from a customer to a vendor.

items.title: Cash-Out Threshold
items.text: When an ESi holder accumulates over $1,000 in their account (e.g., through multiple small payments), they cash out via our 3rd party partners (Western Union, Moneygram), or transfer to their local bank account.

items.title: Ongoing Cycle
items.text: This process repeats continuously, creating a sustainable ecosystem of distribution, circulation, and withdrawal — all while maintaining transparency and traceability.

esiMom.heroTitle: ESi Mom: Using ESi to Help Single Mothers
introBlocks: The EinStrong Foundation’s ESi platform empowers single mothers and their children through direct financial support and educational incentives. The EinStrong Mom Program utilizes ESi to uplift vulnerable families in a secure, cost-effective, and globally scalable way.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
blocks: ESi Mom program ensures a stable basic income for mothers while guaranteeing children attend school and stay on track academically.
Weekly Cash Aid
Mother: $10/week
Child: $5/week per child (Max 2 under 18)
Instant & Secure
Our ESi App creates a biometrics secured account – a globally unique ID among 8B+ people
Cash Aid transferred directly to each account.
Easy to use
Mothers use ESi App or printed ID card at local stores.
Education Requirement
Regular school attendance (less than 10 absences/year)
Maintain passing grades.

countries.heading: The program is already in operation across four countries:

closingBlocks: Through ESi’s digital infrastructure, 100% of donated funds are distributed directly to families. The model is fully transparent, highly efficient, and designed for rapid expansion into new communities worldwide.

By leveraging ESi for targeted, accountable cash assistance, the EinStrong Mom Program provides mothers with the resources, opportunity, and security needed to raise their children and pursue a more stable future. This approach strengthens families and communities - transforming charitable giving into measurable, lasting impact.

esiHumanity.heroTitle: ESi Humanity: Using ESi to Distribute Funds to Vulnerable Populations

whatIs.heading: What is ESi Humanity?
blocks: Our ESi platform provides a cutting-edge solution for delivering financial aid directly to refugees and other vulnerable groups in a simple, efficient, and secure manner. It enables governments, NGOs, and donors to target assistance based on specific criteria such as location, gender, age, or nationality, ensuring relief reaches those who need it most:

items.title: Simple and Targeted Aid Delivery
items.text: Administrators can quickly and precisely direct funds to defined groups (for example, all families in a particular refugee camp or female heads of households in a region) by selecting criteria within the ESi system. This streamlined process eliminates guesswork and complexity, making it easy to channel support to the intended beneficiaries without manual sorting or excessive bureaucracy.

items.title: Efficient Global Disbursement
items.text: ESi’s digital infrastructure bypasses traditional logistical hurdles. Funds are disbursed across borders in real time directly into recipients’ accounts, avoiding the delays and costs associated with intermediaries or cash handling. In emergency situations, this means life-saving assistance reaches people faster, exactly when and where it is needed.

items.title: Robust Security And Verification
items.text: Each ESi account is secured with biometric identity authentication, allowing even individuals without formal ID documents to enroll and receive aid. This high level of security prevents fraud and duplicate claims, so that every dollar of assistance goes to a real, verified person. Donors and aid agencies gain peace of mind knowing that their support is not being misused or diverted.

items.title: Transparency and Accountability
items.text: Every transaction on the ESi platform is recorded and traceable. This transparency gives donors and organizations a full audit trail of how and where funds are distributed. It builds trust by demonstrating that aid is administered fairly and that resources reach the designated population as intended.

closing.heading: How ESi Humanity can help your organization
blocks: By leveraging ESi’s innovative system, humanitarian agencies can deliver targeted aid more effectively than ever before. The platform makes global aid distribution efficient and secure, while also empowering recipients to use assistance for their most urgent needs. This modern approach turns the delivery of aid into a swift, accountable process that maximizes impact for vulnerable populations.

esiClimate.heroTitle: ESi Climate: Using ESi to Fight Global Warming

whatIs.heading: What is ESi Climate?
blocks: At the EinStrong Foundation, we believe the world’s largest polluters must be held financially accountable for the environmental damage - and those funds benefit the people.

The EinStrong ID (ESi) is our mechanism for delivering this vision. Through ESi, companies in oil, gas, mining, and other high-emission sectors are charged a clear environmental fee for each unit of resource extracted. These funds are then redistributed equally and transparently to everyone as our global UBI program.

ubiBreakdown.heading: ESi Climate as a Global UBI Program

buckets.label: Global UBI Distribution
buckets.text: At least 80% of collected environmental fees are redistributed directly to individuals holding an ESi - equally and globally. This “climate-funded UBI” is a form of Universal Basic Income, providing all adults with an equal share of environmental accountability.

buckets.label: Sustainability Programs
buckets.text: Up to 18% is allocated to sustainability programs - including clean energy, reforestation, and climate adaptation - ensuring long-term environmental resilience.

buckets.label: Program Administration
buckets.text: Up to 2% of funds are used to administer the program, with a long-term goal of reducing this share to 1% or less, maximizing the direct benefit to people and the planet.

principlesPolicy.heading: Our Principles and Policy
blocks: Any unspent program funds are redistributed to ESi holders, maintaining the principle of prioritizing people over bureaucracy.

ESi is designed to be globally inclusive, secure, and equitable. Every adult — regardless of nationality, income, or legal status — is eligible for one verified ID and an equal share of distributions. This ensures fairness and prevents abuse.
By shifting the burden to major polluters and distributing the proceeds directly to individuals, ESi turns climate action into a global system of shared responsibility and collective benefit.
It is a model grounded in equity, transparency, and scale — turning environmental justice from a policy goal into a living system.

sections.heading: Our Mission
blocks: The EinStrong Foundation is a registered 501(c)(3) non-profit organization based in the United States, committed to advancing a unified global identification system - the EinStrong ID (ESi) - to strengthen collective action on humanity’s greatest challenges.
Through universal identification and integrated basic financial tools, EinStrong empowers individuals to participate in initiatives addressing climate change, poverty, and social inequality.

sections.heading: The Case for a Global ID
blocks: Approximately one billion individuals globally lack formal identification, limiting access to essential services, financial systems, and civic participation.
In addition, a universally accessible ID is critical to achieving inclusive economic growth, transparent aid distribution, and effective international collaboration.
The EinStrong ID (ESi) ensures that every person - regardless of nationality, documentation status, or geographic location - is recognized, empowered, and included.

sections.heading: Introducing the EinStrong ID (ESi)
blocks: EinStrong ID (ESi) is a universal identification system seamlessly integrated with essential financial capabilities.
Each ESi offers individuals a verified, secure identity, tied to a personal account for financial interaction.
The platform enables both top-down financial transfers - from EinStrong directly to ESi holders - and peer-to-peer transactions among holders.
Enrollment is accessible via a mobile application or physical QR code, ensuring inclusivity even in remote regions.

sections.heading: Distinguishing Features of EinStrong ID (ESi)
bullets: Global Inclusivity: Available to all adults worldwide, including refugees, stateless persons and other individuals lacking legal identity.
Security and Privacy: Advanced biometric technology and verification protocols ensure one identity per individual, while safeguarding personal data.
Universal Equity: Resources are distributed equally across all holders, regardless of nationality, wealth, political affiliation or any other factors.
Direct Empowerment: All financial distributions and peer interactions occur directly within the ESi system, minimizing intermediaries and administrative inefficiencies.

sections.heading: Impact Areas
sections.info: The EinStrong platform channels collective action toward three primary impact areas:
bullets: Climate Action: Environmental levies on major polluters are redistributed equally among ESi holders, promoting global accountability and green transition.
Poverty Support: Financial assistance is directly delivered to individuals through secure ESi accounts, supporting economic inclusion.
Mothers First: Targeted financial aid supports single mothers, conditional on children's school attendance and well-being.

sections.heading: Our Commitment
blocks: Through the creation of a trusted global ID network and empowerment platform, the EinStrong Foundation is building the infrastructure for a more equitable, resilient, and sustainable future - for both humanity and the planet.

posts.title: HOW SUPPORT FROM ESI TRANSFORMED SABITRI’S LIFE
blocks: Sabitri’s life changed forever when her husband was swept away by the Koshi River four years ago. Left alone with two young children and suffering from a chronic stomach illness, she was forced to send her children to work as daily laborers just to survive. School was no longer an option, it was about putting food on the table.

Since joining the ESi Mom program, Sabitri now receives a weekly basic income that covers food, clothing, and other essential needs. Her children no longer work in the fields, they now attend school regularly with perfect attendance. Sabitri has also learned bamboo weaving, giving her a new source of income and pride. Today, she dreams of a brighter future where her children can grow up with opportunity, dignity, and hope.

posts.title: SINGLE MOTHERS EMPOWERED THROUGH FINANCIAL LITERACY WORKSHOP
blocks: In Barahakshetra, the ESi Mom Financial Literacy Workshop brought together hundreds of our ESi Moms to build confidence in managing their finances through the ESi mobile app.

Participants learned to monitor their weekly basic income balances, send and receive funds using the app or their ESi ID cards, and understand key concepts of financial literacy. The training also equipped them to track USD exchange rates and negotiate more effectively with local merchants—ensuring fair pricing when using ESi App to make purchases. This initiative emphasized the importance of financial awareness and self-reliance within the ESi Mom community.
